metadata.title: Open class - Inteli - Institute of Technology and Leadership

content_blocks.text: Attend an open class and discover how our students learn in practice!
content_blocks.subsection: Attend an open class and discover how our students learn in practice!

content_blocks.text: At Inteli, you don't just learn the theory - here, you learn by developing solutions to real problems from day one. Our methodology is based on projects, and now you can experience this up close!
content_blocks.subsection: At Inteli, you don't just learn the theory - here, you learn by developing solutions to real problems from day one. Our methodology is based on projects, and now you can experience this up close!

content_blocks.text: What you will experience in the Open Classroom
content_blocks.subsection: What you will experience in the Open Classroom

content_blocks.text: Inteli Methodology: follow a Sprint and see how students develop projects and structure their deliveries for teachers and partner companies. Campus tour: explore laboratories, our state-of-the-art infrastructure and innovation environments
content_blocks.subsection: What you will experience in the Open Classroom

content_blocks.text: Chat with students and teachers: ask all your questions about the courses and what it's like to be an Inteli student Date and time: 05/12/2025 e 19/12/2025 9am to 11am or 2pm to 4pm
content_blocks.subsection: What you will experience in the Open Classroom

content_blocks.text: Avenida Professor Almeida Prado, 520 - Butantã neighborhood. São Paulo/SP. The Inteli campus is located within the University City.
content_blocks.subsection: What you will experience in the Open Classroom
